text: hi everyone is Helen here today I will
be making a very simple dish to serve
with rice it's grilled eggplant with
scallion boy in Vietnamese is called
Cathy in Omaha this is definitely my
favorite way to cook eggplant especially
in the summer
uncle eggplant has the spongy flesh and
meaty texture but I'll take root it
becomes really tender soft and smoky and
also really creamy
especially when you Grizzles the special
Vietnamese dipping fish sauce and the
scallion oil it is so delicious so let's
begin
the ingredients are super simple you
only need eggplants I'm using the longer
type also called Japanese eggplants a
bunch of green onions and some garlic
and chilies firstly use a skewer or
toothpick to poke all over the eggplants
this helps speed up the cooking time and
also infuse the flesh of the eggplants
with a smoky flavor after grilled keep
rotating until the skin of the eggplant
and turn completely Brown or even charge
it would take about 15 to 20 minutes the
whole point is to charred eggplant so
don't worry if the color getting too
dark when you can easily pick through
the eggplant with a toothpick just peel
and discard the skin
when cooked the flash of the eggplants
become tender and cut a creamy very
delicious
now in a mortar and pestle cross two to
three cloves of garlic one small chili
and a teaspoon of sugar in a separate
bowl mix two tablespoons sugar with
three tablespoons of fish sauce stir
well to dissolve normally I would you
equal amounts of sugar and fish sauce
but because the eggplant turns really
sweet up the grill so I reduce the sugar
my leader
add the crushed garlic and chili to the
sauce and chop up the green onions heat
about two to three tablespoons of
vegetable oil in a pan until quite smoky
and then pour it over the chopped spring
onions this is what we call Mahan or
scallion oil place the pewte eggplants
on a plate and pick out any black bits
run a fork along the fibre grains of the
air plants to separate it into thin
strips that helps absorb the sauce more
finally drizzle the sauce all over the
eggplants are trusting to your taste
and top it up with a fragrance scallion
oil
for garnish you can add in some more
chili slices some crush rotas peanuts or
a crispy fried shallots it can be served
as part of a Vietnamese meal with rice
today I have some fish in tomato sauce
and Chatham as main dish and a side bowl
of vermicelli noodle soup that is so
yummy
just like other awesome dishes that you
have cook taking photos and uploaded on
social media with hashtag helen recipes
I'm really glad that all my recipe have
been successfully replicated by you even
the more complicated ones that is really
impressive thank you so much and if you
liked the video don't forget to click
like and subscribe to my channel for
more delicious Vietnamese food thank you
for watching bye bye
you
you
